sentences.sContent: Then you must know that a bouquet of flowers and card, though very sweet, are not all it takes to make Mother's Day a true holiday.
sentences.sContent_eng: Then you must know that a bouquet of flowers and card, though very sweet, are not all it takes to make Mother's Day a true holiday.
sentences.sCn: 那么你应该知道一粟鲜花或是一张卡片，也许也很甜蜜，但是还不足以体现母亲节真正的意义。

trans.tranOther: a day on which people give cards and presents to their mothers
